column1: Microsoft is currently working on a second generation of its Surface Hub
column2: the company’s giant 55- and 84-inch 4K smart displays.

column1: Microsoft Teams integration will also be available on the Surface Hub in the coming months.
That makes Surface Hub more popular than any other Surface device for Microsoft’s enterprise customers.
Expect to hear more about the Surface Hub 2 in the coming months.
We’re not expecting Microsoft to unveil its Surface Hub 2 at the company’s Build developer conference
